summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3284, for the improvement of 10th Avenue Northeast, from East 40th Street to East 85th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40794 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
